price: Au mnadhani mko salama kwa alioko juu ya kuwa Yeye hakupelekeeni kimbunga chenye changarawe? Mtajua vipi maonyo yangu?
arabic: أَمۡ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِبٗاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ كَيۡفَ نَذِيرِ
footnotes: Bali, mmejiaminisha na Mwenye Ufalme wa mbinguni, kuwa hatakupelekeeni upepo wa kukupopoeni kwa changarawe? Hapo basi mtakijiua kitisho cha onyo langu kwenu!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: am amintum man fī al-samāi an yur'sila ʿalaykum ḥāṣiban fasataʿlamūna kayfa nadhīri
